message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take a bigger share, you can't say no to 70%!
You took a big share last round, I'll give you a slightly bigger one this time
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but don't think you're getting off easy!
I'm trying to find a sweet spot, let's meet in the middle
I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not giving up on getting a better deal!
